Other medications that have an effect on ACE2 concentrations include mineralocorticoid antagonists such as the aldosterone receptor antagonist spironolactone, which possibly increases ACE2 concentrations in macrophages. This was not the case in the heart tissue of patients suffering from chronic heart failure.
45 Statins possibly augment ACE expression in heart and kidney tissue, and may also bring about epigenetic changes in ACE2 gene, but more work is needed to determine the exact mechanism of these findings.
